original_text:
For as you have drunk on my holy mountain,
    so all the nations shall drink continually;
they shall drink and swallow,
    and shall be as though they had never been.
korean_text: 너희가 내 성산에서 마신 것 같이 만국인이 항상 마시리니 곧 마시고 삼켜서 본래 없던 것 같이 되리라

sentences.original_text: For as you have drunk on my holy mountain
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너희가 나의 거룩한 산에서 마신 것 같이

sentences.original_text: so all the nations shall drink continually
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 모든 민족이 끊임없이 마실 것이요

sentences.original_text: and shall be as though they had never been
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 존재하지 않았던 것 같이 될 것이라
